alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 6:47AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Macon, northern Dooly, central Peach and Houston Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 647 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Winchester, or 9 miles south of Fort Valley, moving southeast at 350 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Warner Robins, Unadilla, Marshallville, Byromville, Pinehurst, Dooling, Saint Louis, Hayneville, Meadowdale, Sand Bed, Houston Lake, Grovania, Elko, Grove Park, Lakewood, Moss Oak, Bonaire and Miami Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
